meanings.definition: Of or relating to a superregenerative circuit.
meanings.sent1: The superregenerative circuit was very efficient.
meanings.sent2: The engineer designed a superregenerative system for the project.
meanings.sent3: The superregenerative device seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was superregenerative, constantly coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The superregenerative nature of the technology amazed everyone in the room.

meanings.sent1: The machine was superregenerative, fixing itself automatically.
meanings.sent2: The superhero's powers were superregenerative, allowing him to heal quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity was superregenerative, always getting into mischief.
meanings.sent4: His optimism was superregenerative, bouncing back from setbacks with ease.
meanings.sent5: The plant's growth was superregenerative, thriving in any environment.

meanings.sent1: The superregenerative of cells was fascinating to the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The superregenerative of the forest after the fire was a miracle of nature.
meanings.sent3: The superregenerative of ideas in the brainstorming session was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The superregenerative of the economy brought hope to the citizens.
meanings.sent5: The superregenerative of the starfish's limbs was a remarkable sight.
